sub_title: Manager, Arabic Original Series at Netflix
summary:
Content Executive with five years of SVOD experience in the Arab world. Pan-regional exposure within the key industry hubs (Egypt, Lebanon, Kuwait, UAE, Saudi, Jordan) and strong professional network with the leading talents and producers in each of these markets. 

Strong creative skills acquired through over 16 years of experience of working in key positions in some of the region's biggest and most memorable productions. Able to supervise a project's lifecycle from script to screen while delivering premium, world-class production value.

Dynamic team player with strong logical and communication skills which enable me to set business goals, communicate strategic vision to team members in a clear manner, and lead through mutual alignment.
